topic.title: Reused Topic With Ref to key "topic-01"

body.p: This topic has an unqualified key reference to the key "topic-01", which should resolve to topic topic-01.dita in key scope "scope-01" and topic topic-02.dita in key "scope-02".
Note that in HTML-type output the processor has to produce two different result HTML files for each use of this topic.
